item.description:
This is a 1 hour spiritual multi faith service with a topic related to our humanity and spiritual nature. The topics are related to practical aspects of spirituality. Methods of creating peace and healing in our lives and on our planet will also be discussed.

Each talk is followed by a 20 minute guided meditation that is designed to integrate the message into your heart and into your deeper mind.

After the meditation Pathways' Certified Mediums share messages from those loving souls who have crossed over into The Light. These messages often bring great healing and peace to those in attendance. Donations are accepted. read less
item.how_to_find_us: Judith and William will be welcoming you
item.name: Spiritual Service and Transformational Meditation
